Gems of Welsh Melody
Rhymney, Caerphilly, Wales, UK
Prizes - 1st £10, 2nd £6, 3rd £3. Best soprano and horn - Great Western. Best euphonium and basses - Vochriw. Promoted by Rhymney Cyclists Club.
